products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash rosewood pink is a soft medium-pink perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous pink blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink perfect fit roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This, moisutre-resistant perfect fit roller blind with drill-free fit and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your upvc window or door.

As a simple plain fabric, this bright pink perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Blush Pink Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash blush pink is a beautiful light pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their perfect fit blinds are perfect for upvc windows where a screw-free solution is needed. Using sleek framework and brackets that slide under the window beading, their perfect fit blinds come in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to suit your needs.
